description:
When you or a loved one suffer an injury through no fault of your own, you can depend on Hernandez Law Group, P.C., in Abilene, Texas, to provide high-quality and compassionate assistance with seeking the compensation you need and deserve. Our law firm understands how an injury can upend your world, and we commit ourselves to working diligently toward the most positive outcome possible for each and every client.

Whether you are fighting an insurance company, negotiating with the party responsible for your injuries or taking your matter to court, our attorneys are 100% ready to serve you in seeking the outcome that will bring you peace of mind and help you move forward from the tragic event. We have a stellar record of assisting those with injuries resulting from motor vehicle accidents, defective products, workplace accidents and dangerous properties, among others.

We can also help you hold accountable those who caused you pain and suffering through the commission of a crime, such as a sexual assault, robbery or workplace crime. If you are dealing with the tragic loss of a loved one from someone else's negligence or intentional actions, our law firm can assist you in pursuing justice through a wrongful death claim. Additionally, we have a history of success guiding clients who are seeking U.S. visas, green cards or citizenship through the immigration process.

The attorneys at Hernandez Law Group, P.C., believe that practicing law is more than winning cases in court. Our clients become like family to us, and we strive for the best possible results as we would for our own family members. Contact our law office in Abilene today to schedule your free initial consultation, either in person or through virtual options, and allow us to help you regain your peace of mind.
